message.content:
cs.IR, cs.GT, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.CY 

This paper is primarily focused on the problem of fair recommendation, which is a subfield of information retrieval (cs.IR). However, the paper also deals with fairness issues that span both customers and producers, which can be modeled as a constrained version of the problem of fairly allocating indivisible goods (cs.GT). The proposed algorithm involves a mapping of the fair recommendation problem to a constrained optimization problem, which is a common technique in machine learning and optimization (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the impact of the proposed algorithm on the well-being of producers, which is related to social impact (cs.SI). Finally, the paper deals with the design of recommendation systems for two-sided online platforms, which can be considered a subfield of cybernetics (cs.CY).
